text: The More the Merrier is a 1943 American World War II romantic comedy movie directed by George Stevens and starring Jean Arthur, Joel McCrea, Charles Coburn, Richard Gaines, Bruce Bennett, Donald Douglas, Frank Sully. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures and won an Academy Award and was nominated for 5 others in 1944. It was remade in 1966 as Walk Don't Run. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1943 war movies Category:1943 romance movies Category:1943 comedy movies Category:1940s romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by George Stevens Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies composed by Leigh Harline
title: The More the Merrier
